comment._content: I had no idea this game used to involve actual wheelbarrows.  When did wheelbarrow races change to using children walking on their hands?

comment._content: Well, they probably phased out the barrows after the first several bloody impalements on those rigid slalom spikes . . . .

comment._content: Probably phased out when people no longer owned wheelbarrows!
